item.title: CVE-2021-32542|2024-09-16T19:05:10.400Z -- sysjust -- cts%20web
item.description: The parameters of the specific functions in the CTS Web trading system do not filter special characters, which allows unauthenticated attackers can remotely perform reflected XSS and obtain the usersâ€™ connection token that triggered the attack.
